text: ISada’ka (yeZakâh) kuphela yeyabo bangamahlwempu nabasweleyo, nabo baqashelwe ukuyiqokelela nokomeleza iintliziyo zabo batyekela ngakwi-Islam, nokukhulula abathinjwa, nabo banamatyala naseNdleleni ka-Allâh, nabaseluhambeni; (olu) luxanduva olumiselwe nguAllâh kwaye uAllâh nguSolwazi, uSobulumko
